0.1.0.name: connect20/FlexShopper_Payment
0.1.0.description:
FlexShopper provides a flexible and easy way for you to get the furniture, electronics, appliances and other popular brand name goods with low, affordable and weekly payments. Our goal is to get you approved for the lease amount you need, so you can take home the products you want.
We are dedicated to providing you with the ultimate customer service so that your experience with us is smooth from beginning to end. Transactions with us are confidential and secure. So relax, get approved for a spending limit, go shopping and enjoy!

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

0.2.0.name: connect20/FlexShopper_Payment
0.2.0.description: The FlexShopper Payment extension allows integrating FlexShopper Lease-to-Own Payment method into Magento Store.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

0.2.1.name: connect20/FlexShopper_Payment
0.2.1.description: A payment method wrapping the FlexShopper API to process your durable items.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
